channel.title: New at making servers ....HELP PLZ?
channel.description:
Now dont flame me because i dont know where this file is. cause im good with comps.
But i cant find where the client.java file is, for editing anything on my server, if someone could give a detailed description on how to find it. and maybe a screenshot of where its located at. thnx very much.

item.title: New at making servers ....HELP PLZ?
item.dc:creator: @mindtempest mindtempest
item.description:
@mindtempest wrote:

its in the directory where u extracted the server to, no server runs without it!

Read full topic
